EmailTemplate.name: Eco Integration Message Queue Error
EmailTemplate.subject: INFORM: Sync Error for {!IntegrationMessageQueue__c.JobName__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: {!IntegrationMessageQueue__c.OwnerFullName}, The job {!IntegrationMessageQueue__c.JobName__c} has produced an error. Please review the error message below and take action if needed. Error Message: Link to Record
